Title: Red Purse
Summary: A handmade change purse that reads "patience" in Arabic.

Repository: Collection of Adnan Mohammad Hassan, Baghdad, Iraq

Title: Red Purse Reverse
Summary: The reverse of the purse reads "Um Muhammad," or Mother of Muhammad, the title of Adnan's wife, mother of their oldest son Muhammad.
Name.creator: Adnan Mohammad Hasan
Repository: Collection of Adnan Mohammad Hassan, Baghdad, Iraq
